title: Set app title to YONO DAN

requirements.text: Set the app title to 'YONO DAN' in the HTML entry point (frontend/index.html <title> tag) so it appears in browser tabs and when shared.
acceptanceCriteria: Browser tab shows 'YONO DAN' when the app is open
The <title> tag in frontend/index.html reads 'YONO DAN'

requirements.text: Update the app name/branding displayed in the app header and any splash/login screens from the current title to 'YONO DAN'.
acceptanceCriteria: App header or logo area shows 'YONO DAN' as the app name
Login/signup screen reflects the 'YONO DAN' branding

constraints: Do not change any game logic, backend data, or user account functionality
nonGoals: Changing the app's color theme or layout
